caller_intent: Jamie requested a quote to add a new vehicle (2020 Chevy Traverse) to her existing insurance policy, which currently includes a 2015 Chrysler 200.
resolution_steps: Agent Shana retrieved Jamie's existing policy details (2015 Chrysler 200 at 61 Whitney Road, Moxie).
Confirmed Jamie had not yet purchased the new vehicle but was considering it.
Used the VIN provided (GNEDKW4LJ31674) to identify the 2020 Chevy Traverse.
Asked about vehicle usage (commuting >10 miles to work) and payment method (cash, no loan).
Calculated premium impact for adding the Traverse: $2,986.11 annually ($805/month estimated).
Explained endorsement down payment structure ($248.74 initial payment).
Provided alternative quote for replacing the Chrysler with the Traverse: $1,215 annually ($492/month).
knowledge_required: Insurance policy structure and premium calculation
Impact of vehicle usage (commuting distance) on rates
Endorsement payment schedules for policy changes
systems_referenced: Internal policy management system (used to retrieve policy details and calculate premiums)
summary: Jamie sought a quote to add a 2020 Chevy Traverse to her existing policy. Shana retrieved her current policy details, gathered vehicle specifics, and provided a breakdown of costs for both adding the new car and replacing the existing Chrysler. The agent explained payment structures and estimated monthly premiums, concluding with a resolved outcome.
